planTitle: Next Steps Plan for Phase 3 Execution

actionItems.description: Initiate detailed feature prioritization based on validated user needs and market gaps.
actionItems.successCriteria: Feature list aligned with top pain points and market opportunity.

actionItems.description: Develop initial product roadmap and resource allocation plan.
actionItems.successCriteria: Roadmap approved by stakeholders, resources assigned.

actionItems.description: Conduct risk assessment and mitigation planning for identified challenges.
Kick off Phase 3 with stakeholder alignment meeting.
actionItems.successCriteria: All stakeholders aligned on next steps and responsibilities.
